definition: authentic (painting or calligraphy)/genuine work (of famous artist)

sentences.english: He found an original drawing of Picasso's in the basement of his father's house.
sentences.chinese: 他在父親房屋的地下室裏找到了一幅畢加索的真跡。

sentences.english: This is the painting by Tong Pak Fu.
sentences.chinese: 這幅纔是唐伯虎的真跡，皇爺。

sentences.english: Most historians accept that the documents are authentic.
sentences.chinese: 大多數歷史家承認了這些文件乃爲真跡。

sentences.english: Large Seal Script of the artworks, generally considered to be "Ancient Proses on Stones."
sentences.chinese: 大篆的真跡，一般認爲是“石鼓文”。

sentences.english: You can't get an original Picasso for love nor money.
sentences.chinese: 你無論怎麼樣也不會得到一幅畢加索的真跡。

sentences.english: Ashmore discovered by forging, immediately to find authentic.
sentences.chinese: 安石發現畫作僞造，要馬上尋找真跡。

sentences.english: A careful examination of the painting could tell whether it is an original or a copy.
sentences.chinese: 仔細研究一下這幅畫，就能看出它是贗品還是真跡。

sentences.english: We are so lucky to be able to see an authentic work of his.
sentences.chinese: 能看到鄭板橋的真跡我們太有眼福了。

sentences.english: Experts vouch for the painting's authenticity.
sentences.chinese: 由專家確認該畫是否爲真跡。

sentences.english: The experts have vouched for the painting's authenticity.
sentences.chinese: 專家已經確認了該畫是真跡。

sentences.english: The authentic copies of Wang Hsi-chih's calligraphy are no longer available now.
sentences.chinese: 王羲之已經沒有真跡傳世了，現在傳世的都是鉤填本。

sentences.english: An expert was needed to authenticate the original van gogh painting from his imitation.
sentences.chinese: 這幅畫是梵谷的真跡還是贗品，需由專家來鑑定。

sentences.english: The experts have vouched for the painting's authenticity .
sentences.chinese: 專家已經確認了該畫是真跡。

sentences.english: Today, you could buy the same "Van Gogh" in Chinatown for the price of a frame.
sentences.chinese: 今天，你可以在唐人街買到與真跡相同的“梵高”。

sentences.english: You will not be allowed to open your box unless the employee at the bank is satisfied that the signature is genuine.
sentences.chinese: 直到銀行僱員確信簽名是真跡後，才允許你打開箱子。

sentences.english: He palmed off the painting as a genuine Cezanne.
sentences.chinese: 他把那幅畫冒充塞尚的真跡賣掉了。

definition: handed down from ancient times/family heirloom
Gu Kaizhi or Ku K'aichih (346-407), famous painter of Eastern Jin dynasty, one of the Four Great Painters of the Six Dynasties 六朝四大家
to copy (a model of calligraphy or painting etc)
ink marks/original calligraphy or painting of famous person
Chang Dai-chien or Zhang Daqian (1899-1983), one of the greatest Chinese artists of the 20th century
Huang Binhong (1865-1955), art historian and literati painter
